mapper.select: select ui.id, ui.name, ui.nickname, u.reg_dt, if(u.ban_flag = 1, '정지', '정상') as state, count(rp.result_code) as cnt from user_info ui inner join user u on ui.user_code = u.code left join reply rpy on u.code = rpy.user_code left join report_reg rr on rpy.code = rr.reply_code left join report_proc rp on rr.code = rp.reg_code -- where rp.result_code = 1 group by ui.id order by u.reg_dt;

select ui.id, ui.name, ui.nickname, rp.dt, if(u.ban_flag = 1, '정지', '정상') as state, if(count(rp.result_code) is not null, count(rp.result_code), 0) as cnt from user_info ui inner join user u on ui.user_code = u.code left join reply rpy on u.code = rpy.user_code left join report_reg rr on rpy.code = rr.reply_code left join report_proc rp on rr.code = rp.reg_code where rp.result_code = 1 group by ui.id having cnt >= 3 order by rp.dt;

select d.id, d.name, d.nickname, d.dt, if(d.code is not null, '탈퇴', '정상') as state, count(rp.result_code) as cnt from user u join `drop` d on u.code = d.user_code left join reply rpy on u.code = rpy.user_code left join report_reg rr on rpy.code = rr.reply_code left join report_proc rp on rr.code = rp.reg_code group by d.id order by u.reg_dt;

select (select name from user_info where user_code = rr.user_code) as reportUser, ui.name as reportedUser, rpy.content, case when rr.type_code = 1 then '스팸홍보/도배' when rr.type_code = 2 then '음란물' when rr.type_code = 3 then '불법정보' when rr.type_code = 4 then '청소년유해' when rr.type_code = 5 then '욕설/혐오/차별' when rr.type_code = 6 then '개인정보노출' when rr.type_code = 7 then '불쾌한표현' else '반려' end as reason, rr.dt, rr.code from report_proc rp right join report_reg rr on rp.reg_code = rr.code inner join reply rpy on rr.reply_code = rpy.code inner join user_info ui on rpy.user_code = ui.user_code where rp.result_code is null

select (select name from user_info where user_code = rr.user_code) as reportUser, ui.name as reportedUser, rpy.content, case when rr.type_code = 1 then '스팸홍보/도배' when rr.type_code = 2 then '음란물' when rr.type_code = 3 then '불법정보' when rr.type_code = 4 then '청소년유해' when rr.type_code = 5 then '욕설/혐오/차별' when rr.type_code = 6 then '개인정보노출' when rr.type_code = 7 then '불쾌한표현' else '반려' end as reason, rp.dt from report_proc rp right join report_reg rr on rp.reg_code = rr.code inner join reply rpy on rr.reply_code = rpy.code inner join user_info ui on rpy.user_code = ui.user_code
